item.title: How to setup minikube lab on debian 9 with virtualbox
item.description: How to setup minikube lab on debian 9 with virtualbox How to install Virtualbox on debian 9 sudo add-apt-repository "deb http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/debian stretch contrib" wget -q https://www.virtualbox.org/download/oracle_vbox_2016.asc -O- | sudo apt-key add - wget -q https://www.virtualbox.org/download/oracle_vbox.asc -O- | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install virtualbox-5.2 Remove old version of minikube > minikube stop >VBoxManage unregistervm minikube --delete >minikube detele >``` ### Reinstall and start minikube bash minikube start -v 99
